doctor.name: Dr. Md. Ariful Islam
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Ariful Islam is a General Surgeon in Kushtia. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Surgery). He is a Consultant, Surgery at Kushtia Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Centre, Kushtia. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Ariful Islam at Popular Diagnostic Centre, Kushtia is 3pm to 6pm (Closed: Monday), 9am to 3pm (Friday).

chamber.address: City Tower, House # 01, Mir Mosharraf Hossain Road, Coart Para, Kushtia

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Amirul Islam
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Amirul Islam is a General Surgeon in Kushtia. His qualification is MBBS, MS (SURGERY). He is a Ex. Associate Professor, Surgery at Kushtia Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Sono Diagnostic Center, Kushtia. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Amirul Islam at Sono Diagnostic Center, Kushtia is 1pm to 2pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Debashis Paul
doctor.info: Dr. Debashis Paul is a General Surgeon in Kushtia. His qualification is MBBS (DMC), FCPS (Surgery), FMAS (Laparoscopy, India). He is a Assistant Professor, Surgery at Kushtia Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Amin Diagnostic & Medical Services, Kushtia. Practicing hour of Dr. Debashis Paul at Amin Diagnostic & Medical Services, Kushtia is 3pm to 8pm (Sat to Thu), 10am to 8pm (Fri).
